Lingua: or The combat of the tongue, and the fiue senses for superiority A pleasant comœdie. Tomkis, Thomas, fl. 1604-1615.
[100] p.
Printed by G. Eld, for Simon Waterson, At London : 1607.
By Thomas Tomkis. Partly in verse. Signatures: A-M⁴ N² . The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
